name: Scrolls of the Lord
description: Scrolls of the Lord is a classic fantasy from the first person, taking as a basis the best games in this genre. We have to play for the criminal sentenced to death, but at the behest of the case, escaped her having escaped in the most unusual way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 710 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
